com.apusplay.sdk

类 ApusPlaySdk

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.apusplay.sdk.ApusPlaySdk

  • public class ApusPlaySdk
extends Object
    This is a simplified class to use the Apus Play SDK, exposing most useful methods to developers.

    Note: The SDK can only be used after initialized successfully. 

     
                InitCallBack initCallBack = new InitCallBack(){

                        
                        public void onSuccess(InitResult result) {
                                // SDK init successfully
                                String clientId = result.getClientId();
                                Log.v("clientId", "clientId="+clientId);
                        }

                        
                        public void onAbort() {
                                // TODO Auto-generated method stub
                                
                        }

                        
                        public void onFailure(Throwable t, int errorCode, String msg) {
                                // SDK init failed
                                
                        }
                        
                };
                
                try {
                        ApusPlaySdk.initialize(getApplicationContext(), properties, initCallBack);
                } catch (ValidationException e) {
                        // Failed because of configure incorrectly
                        e.printStackTrace();
                }
    作者:
    Shyq

      void pay(Context context, Bundle parameters, PayCallBack payCallBack)
      已过时。 
      This is deprecated method. Please use alternative approach as following // 3. Get Payable instance with PayConfig // 3.1 Prepare PayConfig PayConfig payConfig = ApusPlaySdk.getInstance().getPayConfig(); // 3.2 Get payable instance via payConfig // If the payConfig is null, the default payconfig would be used. Payable pay = PayManager.getPayable(payConfig); // 4. Invoke the pay method with required arguments if(pay!=null){ pay.pay(context, parameters, payCallBack); } else { // Error }

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(Context context,
              InitConfig initConfig,
              ICallBack initCallBack)
                       throws ValidationException
        Initialize SDK environment
        参数:
        context - the application context to initialize the SDK.
        initConfig - Some configuration properties.
        抛出:
        ValidationException - exception throws if any validation failed, such as AndroidManifest.xml not include required components, permissions, or values/string not contain required app ids, etc..

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(Context context,
              Map properties,
              ICallBack initCallBack)
                       throws ValidationException
        Initialize SDK environment
        参数:
        context - the application context to initialize the SDK.
        properties - Some key-values can be passed via this properties.
        抛出:
        ValidationException - exception throws if any validation failed, such as AndroidManifest.xml not include required components, permissions, or values/string not contain required app ids, etc..

        参数:
        context - the application context to Call interface.
        callBack - RequestCallBack

      • requestUserExtInfo

        public void requestUserExtInfo(Context context,
                      RequestCallBack callBack)
        Load user's extra information
        参数:
        context -
        callBack - RequestCallBack, if the data is successfully retrieved, it would be in json format {"uid":101,"supa_no":50112,"country_code":"CHN","lang":"zh_CN"}" where has values for keys such as "country_code" and "lang"

      • updateUserExtInfo

        public void updateUserExtInfo(Context context,
                     Map<String,String> params,
                     RequestCallBack callBack)
        Update user's extra information
        参数:
        context - the application context of caller
        params - the information map to updated
        callBack - the callback after the information is submitted and updated

      • updateUserInfo

                  Map<String,String> params,
                  RequestCallBack callBack)
        Modify user's basic profile information
        参数:
        context - the application context of caller
        params - the information map to updated
        callBack - the callback after the information is submitted and updated

      • uploadAvatar

        public void uploadAvatar(Context context,
                Map<String,String> params,
                RequestCallBack<UserRequestResult> callBack)
        Upload user's head image. The key of image to upload is "imagePath" must be set before this method is invoked.
        参数:
        context - the application context of the caller
        params - parameter's in map form. The key of image to upload is "imagePath" must be set before this method is invoked.
        callBack - the callback invoked after the image is uploaded successfully or not

      • pay

        @Deprecated
public void pay(Context context,
                  Bundle parameters,
                  PayCallBack payCallBack)
        已过时。 This is deprecated method. Please use alternative approach as following // 3. Get Payable instance with PayConfig // 3.1 Prepare PayConfig PayConfig payConfig = ApusPlaySdk.getInstance().getPayConfig(); // 3.2 Get payable instance via payConfig // If the payConfig is null, the default payconfig would be used. Payable pay = PayManager.getPayable(payConfig); // 4. Invoke the pay method with required arguments if(pay!=null){ pay.pay(context, parameters, payCallBack); } else { // Error }
        Pay in Payment gateway approach To pay via payment gateway such as PayPal, Payssion, etc.
        参数:
        context - the application context that call this pay method
        parameters - parameter list in Bundle
        payCallBack - payment callback. Please refer to PayCallBack for detail
        抛出:
        ApusPlayException

        public PayConfig getPayConfig()

        public void setLandscape(boolean flag)
        The UI is in landscape or portrait view.
        参数:
        flag - true for landscape view, false for portrait view.

      • getCommonParamters

        public String getCommonParamters(Context c)
        The common parameter list. The parameter list in form "key1=value1&key2=value2&...&keyn=valuen". Since these parameter are in raw data format, please encode it before submit via method GET.
        参数:
        c - the application context via which to collect some resource info.
        返回:
        the parameter list in form

      • getEncodedCommonParamters

        public String getEncodedCommonParamters(Context context)
        The common parameter list. The parameter list in form "key1=value1&key2=value2&...&keyn=valuen". Since these parameter are in raw data format, please encode it before submit via method GET.
        参数:
        context - the application context via which to collect some resource info.
        返回:
        the parameter list in form
